footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Mualani | Update Date: 03/19/2025 | Editor: zmizuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Surf's Up__
Mualani's best-in-slot option, providing her with the most buffs.
__Sarificial Jade__
A strong weapon at high refinements, Mualani's second-best option at R5.
__The Widsith__
Mualani's best 4-star weapon. She can utilize 2 out of 3 buffs, though the ATK buff is completely useless for her. 
__Ring of Yaxche__
Craftable catalyst that is similar to The Widsith, giving HP% and Normal Attack buff.
__A thousand floating dreams__
A solid stat stick that boosts Mualani's Elemental Mastery, enhancing her Vaporize damage.
__Tome of the Eternal Flow__
Provides CRIT DMG and HP%, both of which are valuable stats for Mualani.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Hydro DMG Bonus% or HP%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental skill: Surfshark Wavebreaker
**2)** Elemental burst: Stormburst Shot

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Mualani’s main damage source scales strictly with HP, meaning she does not benefit from any ATK buffs. If you are using the Obsidian Codex artifact set alongside a CRIT Rate weapon, you risk overstacking CRIT Rate, making it a far less valuable substat.
Additionally, Mualani’s Normal Attack: Cooling Treatment does not increase her Sharky Bite damage, so it can be ignored.
